description: This scene depicts an absurd moment where one fish attempts to leap out of the water onto a slope, while another fish watches from below the surface. The situation presents a surreal take on evolutionary progression or exploration, applying the concept of a significant step for a species to fish attempting to leave their natural aquatic environment. The irony lies in a creature perfectly adapted for water attempting to venture onto land, a fundamentally unsuitable environment for it. It highlights the inherent absurdity of applying human notions of progress to non-human species in contradictory contexts.
caption: “One small step for a fish, one giant leap for fishkind.”
